alert.note: Alert for Orange; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 1:50PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Lake and southwestern Orange Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 150 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Lake Louisa, or 12 miles south of Groveland, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orlando, Apopka, Ocoee, Winter Garden and Maitland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!
